author: David Khorram
content:
yes we can , We working with 
http://www.tacanow.org we are planning to develop a CrowdSourcing Engine collecting info , knowledge and wisdom, solutions and statistics from the Autism ( the Crowd ) and  build an Expert Sourcing engine to provide info , statistics and facts from "the crowd " to autism expert community  . We also are planning to require fund through crowd sourcing techniques. All in next 4 months using Google Cloud technology . .
